moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Magnetic Flux
moves.description: The user manipulates magnetic fields which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

moves.name: Ion Deluge
moves.description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.
